text: geudeul-i malhagil “yudaein-ina gidoggyoin-i doesio, geuleomyeon geudaedeul-i indobad-eul geos-io” geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala ‘geuleohji anhnola. (uliga ttaleuneun geos-eun) hananim hanbunman-eul gyeongbaehaneun abeulaham-ui jong-gyola. geuneun hananimkke daedeunghan jonjaeleul duneun jadeul jung-ui hanaga anieossnola.’
